name: Deep Space Invasion
description:
Deep Space Invasion is a game made in 48h during GGJ20 (FGJ20) by Toni Hannula, Heikki Raussi ja Elina Parkkinen. GGJ page

Top-down shooter/puzzle game where you must make your way through hordes of aliens and some puzzles to repair the life support and save the crew of your space ship.

Controls

  • Move: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Fire: LMB
  • Change Weapon: 1-4 or scroll
  • Interact: E
  • Hold to Run: LSHIFT

Instructions

  • To interact you must be unarmed
  • There is no win condition, the game is essentially over after the welding puzzle
  • There is no game over. You'll have to alt+F4 when you die lol
  • To solve the password puzzle: find a repeating pattern of 7 characters
